titles: Advice to the confuter of Bellarmin with some considerations upon the antiquity of the Church of England.
notes: An answer to Simon Patrick's Second note of the church examined, viz., Antiquity.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707. --  Second note of the church examined, viz., Antiquity.
Bellarmino, Roberto Francesco Romolo, --  Saint, 1542-1621. --  De notis ecclesiae.
